title: How to get free audio book downloads - Quora

response.answer_text: There is not a thing that could be free and good, like those big platforms such as iTunes, they have so many high-quality audiobooks that I enjoy listening, you have to pay for their efforts if you want to enjoy those high-quality shows. you can check these sites: Google Play BooksLibbyAMusicSoft Apple Music Converter (you can listen to Apple’s audiobooks with this one）Audible
